column4: When i boot up I have to enter the grub menu, hit E on the kernel, and edit that text.  Where do I find that file once I'm logged on? I would like to make the changed permanent

'nomodeset' and 'quiet splash' have nothing to do w/ each other, they can be used concurrently.. and the file you want to edit for making that change is /etc/default/grub, after which you run 'sudo update-grub'; you don't edit the grub.cfg directly as that change would be lost after e.g. a kernel upgrade
